title: Diagnostic
content:
Is there clarity in the area with the actions, targets and strategy?.

 Is everyone commit with the objective of the ares? Which data are creating, needing and using the area?.

title: Analytics Engineering and Commercial Business Plan
content: With analytics engineering, I ensure that data is useful for analysis: Designing dimensional models (star schema) for dashboards, complex SQL queries for business metrics, and standardized documentation of KPI definitions..

title: Business Intelligence and Visualization
content: With Business Intelligence I create the daily visual tools that keep update our KPIÂ´s and reports that are used for all the desicion-makers. Creative dashboards that every area can read it and undestand it.

title: Forecast models and Data Culture
content: And now, I can integrated forecast models. Lets keep couching on the Data Culture.
